doctors.name: Dr. Darshit Dalal
doctors.description: Dr. Darshit Dalal is a renowned doctor in Ahmedabad. He specialises in Oncology. He has been practicing medicine for over 26 years. Apart from His association with different hospitals, He has put His skills to the test in many other ways. He has been an active member of various organisations, including Indian Society of Oncology,, Gujarat State Surgeons Association. Dr. Darshit Dalal finished His MS - General Surgery from Gujarat University, India. He also has a Senior Residency in Surgical Oncology from Tata Memorial Hospital, Mumbai.

doctors.name: Dr. Akash Shah
doctors.description: Dr. Akash Shah is an esteemed doctor practising Oncology in Ahmedabad. He has more than 9 years of experience. Beyond His affiliation with many hospitals, He has been professionally active in many other ways. Dr. Akash Shah is an alum of Baroda University where He earned a MBBS. Thereafter, Dr. Akash Shah earned DM - Medical Oncology from Cancer Institute (WIA), Adyar.

doctors.name: Dr. Malhar Patel
doctors.description: Ahmedabad-based Dr. Malhar Patel is a well-known doctor specialising in Oncology. Dr. Malhar Patel has been practicing medicine for over 9 years. Dr. Malhar Patel practices medicine at CIMS Cancer Center, CIMS Hospital. Dr. Malhar Patel has worked with CBCC Apollo, Jaslok Hospital & Research Center in the past. Dr. Malhar Patel specialises in Cancer Screening (Preventive), Brachytherapy (Internal Radiation Therapy), Radiotherapy, Stereotactic Radio Surgery (SRS), Stereotactic Body Radio Therapy (SBRT), Image Guided Radio Therapy (IGRT). Besides being affiliated with many hospitals, Dr. Malhar Patel has been professionally active in other important ways. Dr. Malhar Patel is also a member of prestigious institutions such as Association of Radiation Oncologists of India (AROI). Dr. Malhar Patel is an alum of Jaslok Hospital and Research Centre, Mumbai where Dr. Malhar Patel earned a DNB - Radiation Oncology. After that, Dr. Malhar Patel went on to do MBBS from Dr. D Y Patil University, Pune.

doctors.name: Dr. Bhavesh B. Parekh
doctors.description: Dr. Bhavesh B. Parekh is a well-known doctor based in Ahmedabad who specialises in Oncology. With 18 years of experience, Dr. Bhavesh B. Parekh has been associated with various prestigious hospitals and clinics. Dr. Bhavesh B. Parekh currently works at HCG Cancer Centre. Some of the places where Dr. Bhavesh B. Parekh has worked in the past include B J M C, B J M C, B J M C, GCRI, Shubham Hospital. Dr. Bhavesh B. Parekh specialises in Hormone Therapy For Breast Cancer, Cancer Treatment, Medical Oncology, Hemato Oncology.

doctors.name: Dr. Amol Agarwal
doctors.description: Dr. Amol Agarwal is a well-known doctor based in Ahmedabad. He specializes in Heart Conditions, Complex Trauma, Cardiac Procedure, Carotid Angioplasty And Stenting, Chest Pain Treatment, Implantable Cardioverter-Defibrillators (Icds) and has been practicing medicine for over 23 years. Dr. Amol Agarwal is affiliated with many hospitals and has been an active member of various organizations including MNAMS, FACC. He completed MBBS from B J Medical College Ahemdabad and also has a DNB - Cardiology from G B Pant Hospital / Moulana Azad Medical College, New Delhi.

doctors.name: Dr. Sandeep Agrawal
doctors.description: Dr. Sandeep Agrawal is a renowned doctor in Ahmedabad who specializes in Cardiology and Pacemaker Implantation. He has been practicing medicine for over 18 years and is affiliated with multiple hospitals. Dr. Sandeep Agrawal earned a MBBS from King Edward Memorial Hospital and Seth Gordhandas Sunderdas Medical College and also has a FRCS - General Surgery from Yorkhire University - UK.

doctors.name: Dr. URMIL GIRISHBHAI SHAH
doctors.description: Dr. URMIL GIRISHBHAI SHAH is a well-known doctor based in Ahmedabad who has been practicing medicine for over 23 years. He is affiliated with multiple hospitals and has earned an MD - Cardiology from Gujarat University, India. Post that Dr. URMIL GIRISHBHAI SHAH went on to take DM - Cardiology from Gujarat University, India.

doctors.name: Dr. Tushar Sharma
doctors.description: Dr. Tushar Sharma is a renowned doctor in Ahmedabad who specializes in Cardiology, Vascular Surgery, Thoracic surgery, and Cardiac Surgery. He has more than 3 years of experience and practices medicine at VS Hospital. Dr. Tushar Sharma has worked with Shalby hospital in the past and completed MCh - Cardio Thoracic and Vascular Surgery from Smt. NHL Municipal Medical College, Ahmedabad.

doctors.name: Dr. MILAN CHINUBHAI CHAG
doctors.description: Dr. MILAN CHINUBHAI CHAG is an esteemed doctor practicing Cardiology in Ahmedabad. He has 29 years of experience and has been associated with various prestigious hospitals and clinics. Dr. MILAN CHINUBHAI CHAG graduated with a MD - Cardiology from Gujarat University, India and also has a DM.

doctors.name: Dr. Bhumir Chauhan
doctors.description: Ahmedabad-based Dr. Bhumir Chauhan is a well-known doctor specialising in Neurology. With 7 years of experience, He has been associated with various prestigious hospitals and clinics. Dr. Bhumir Chauhan is now working with Zydus Hospital, Ahmedabad. Some of the places where Dr. Bhumir Chauhan has worked in the past include Narayana Health City, Bangalore, Narayana Health City, Bangalore, LG Hospital & AMCMET Medical College, Ahmedabad, VS Hospital, Ahmedabad. Dr. Bhumir Chauhan specialises in Dementia Treatment, Epilepsy Treatment, Vertigo Treatment, stroke rehab, Nerve and Muscle Disorders, Neuromuscular Disorders. Beyond His affiliation with many hospitals, He has been professionally active in many other ways. He is a member of Ahmedabad Medical Association, Indian Medical Association (IMA). He graduated with a DNB - Neurology from Narayana Hrudayalaya Institute , Bangalore. Post that Dr. Bhumir Chauhan went on to take His MBBS from Smt NHL Municipal Medical college & Vadilal Sarabhai Hospital, Ahmedabad.

doctors.name: Dr. Mahendra Singh Chouhan
doctors.description: Dr. Mahendra Singh Chouhan is a renowned doctor in Ahmedabad. Dr. Mahendra Singh Chouhan specialises in Neurology. Dr. Mahendra Singh Chouhan has over 12 years of experience practising medicine in various hospitals and clinics. Dr. Mahendra Singh Chouhan specialises in Electroconvulsive Therapy (ECT), Surgery Of The Facial Nerve, CSF Rhinorrhoea Repair Surgery. In addition to affiliation with multiple hospitals, Dr. Mahendra Singh Chouhan has been professionally active in many other ways. Dr. Mahendra Singh Chouhan graduated with a MBBS from All India Institute of Medical Sciences, New Delhi. After that, Dr. Mahendra Singh Chouhan went on to do MCh - Neuro Surgery from All India Institute of Medical Sciences, New Delhi.

doctors.name: Dr. Shuchit Pandey
doctors.description: Dr. Shuchit Pandey is an esteemed doctor practising Neurology in Ahmedabad. Dr. Shuchit Pandey has more than 6 years of experience. doctors.name: Dr. Tejas D. Shah
doctors.description: Dr. Tejas D. Shah is a respected Eye Surgeon and Ophthalmologist who currently stays in Ambawadi in Ahmedabad, Gujarat. With 29 years of successful work experience he holds numerous successful eye surgeries in his records. He received the MBBS degree in the Smt. NHL Municipal Medical College, Ahmedabad in 1987 and his Diploma and MS in Ophthalmology from the Smt. NHL Municipal Medical College, Ahmedabad in 1991. In 1992 he joined the Amdavad Eye Laser Hospitals Pvt. Ltd as an Ophthalmologist and is presently its director. He has received the Fellowship in Cataract Management and completed the coursework under Dr. A. R. Vasavada and a Fellowship in Corneal Diseases from L.V. Prasad Eye Institute.

doctors.name: Dr. Shashi N Jha
doctors.description: Dr. Shashi N Jha is one of the best Ophthalmologists in Ganga Ram Hospital, Delhi. He has had many happy patients in his 42 years of journey as a Ophthalmologist. He is a qualified MD - Ophthalmology, MBBS Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery. He is currently associated with Sir Ganga Ram Hospital in Ganga Ram Hospital, Delhi.

doctors.description: Doctor Anita Bisht has had many happy patients in his/her 12 years of journey as a Ophthalmologist. Doctor has done MBBS, Diploma in Ophthalmology.

doctors.description: Dr. Ruchi Mehta is one of the best Ophthalmologists in Gandhinagar Highway, Ahmedabad. She has over 15 years of experience as a Ophthalmologist. She has completed MBBS, MS - Ophthalmology. She is currently practising at Advance retina and eye care in Gandhinagar Highway, Ahmedabad.

He is a MBBS,MD(medicine), MD- Medicine, DNB- Nephrology . You can consult Dr. Hasit Patel at Labh kidney clinic in Baroda, Ahmedabad.

doctors.name: Dr. Jay Harshad Shah
doctors.description: dr. Jay harshad shah strive to provide quality care and best treatment to all kind of kidney patients by patiently listening to them, identifying disease and then working hand in hand with them to achieve better quality life. Compassion and dedication for patient care is assured at our clinic as the patients? satisfaction & health is our prime concern. Dr Jay H Shah has studied in premier institutes of country.He studied MBBS from BJ Medical College and was a meritorious student throughout.He completed MD in Internal Medicine from the prestigious Maulana Azad Medical College,Delhi.He trained under pioneers of nephrology in IKDRC, Civil Hospital which serves as a benchmark for kidney care in India.
